## Subscriber.handleChange() method

Called when a subject this instance has subscribed to changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
handleChange(subject: any, args: any): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

</td><td>

The subject of the change.


</td></tr>

args


</td><td>

any


</td><td>
